name: Tokyo Mono Hara Shi: Karasu no Mori Gakuen Kitan
name_original: Tokyo Mono Hara Shi: Karasu no Mori Gakuen Kitan
description:
Tokyo Mono Hara Shi: Karasu no Mori Gakuen Kitan (東京鬼祓師 鴉乃杜學園奇譚) is a Adventure/Dungeon Crawler/RPG/Visual Novel video game published by Atlus released on April 22nd, 2010 for the PlayStation Portable.
Spin-off of Tokyo Majin Gakuen.
